short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly save svg on page as png.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple browser plugin, when you need to save an svg image on any page in png format, you can right click on the image, save it after installing the plugin. Also, the plugin supports customising the width of the png so that you can freely download the size you want.
